title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Career Progress Bonuses
content:
Link up with the Amir cousins by purchasing a Salvage Yard and use your combined knowledge of the Los Santos auto market to steal and sell prized rides.

In doing so, you’ll also make your way through Career Progress tiers and receive rewards befitting a true gearhead, including Red’s Cap for completing basic Tier 1 challenges, all the way up to a Gold Buzzard Attack Chopper for fulfilling Tier 4’s more demanding tasks.
